scripts.railway:migrate: echo 'Running database migration...' && node scripts/validate_env.js && if [ -n "$DATABASE_URL" ]; then echo 'PostgreSQL detected, running migration...' && node scripts/pg_migrate.js; else echo 'No DATABASE_URL found, skipping migration'; fi
scripts.railway:serve: echo 'Starting server...' && node scripts/validate_env.js && node server.js
